channel.title: Item.cfg I didnt use spaces so help please!
channel.description: My run.bat gives this error. Yes run.bat, not compile.bat! [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:377) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:65) Press any key to continue . . .[/code] this seems to be a problem with my computer. I have downloaded totally untouched item.cfg's and i get the same error. I run windows 7 64bit professional. Any fixes? yes i edit it with notepad. Yes it is a text only format. yes i have not used a space, i'm not stupid.

item.title: Item.cfg I didnt use spaces so help please!
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

Then explain why it works 100% on my old computer. Totally unchanged item.cfg. I have not used a space for item.cfg in a long time because i am not that stupid. Do not say i may have recently used one accidently. I have just transferred it from my computer.
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?qyiuk9zg2beyl6x <- thats the link to it. See if it works for you. IF there is a virus, then im a big fag.

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg I didnt use spaces so help please!
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

dude lol… okay. two things.

  1. you ethier copied and pasted, or you use space bar.
  2. use tab once! Just press it once. And your problem, will be gone.

Read full topic
